title: Adobe After Effects |Visual effects and motion graphics software | 12-month Subscription with auto-renewal, PC/Mac
description: Create cinematic movie titles, intros, and transitions. Start a fire or make it rain. Animate a logo or character. With After Effects , the industry-standard motion graphics and visual effects software, you can take any idea and make it move.
